title: Z Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Delivery, Take-out, Pizzeria, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of pizza chain restaurant. While the menu is predominately meat, may offer a vegan cheese for pizza, or it may contain casein.  The chain has stated that they will be changing their brand of vegan cheese soon. Their basil pesto sauce is apparently also NOT vegan.
